section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Drawer" means the individual who makes or signs a check or other draft.
"Draft" does not include a credit or debit card sales draft.

text.section: Subject to the provisions of subsection (c) of this section, as a condition of accepting a check or other draft as payment for consumer credit, goods, realty, or services, a person may not request or record the account number of any credit card of the drawer of the check or other draft.

The provisions of this section do not prohibit a person from:
Requesting the drawer to display a credit card for purposes only of identification or credit worthiness;
Requesting or recording the type or issuer of a credit card of the drawer; or
Recording the number and expiration date of a credit card if the person requesting the information has agreed with the credit card issuer to cash checks as a service to the issuer's cardholders and the issuer has agreed to guarantee payment of cardholder checks cashed by that person.
